src:
台式涼麵 有趣又好吃（視頻）

07 Nov 2019, 02:13

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月07日訊】台式涼麵 Taiwanese Cold Noodles
二人份量 Serve 2芝麻醬 50g Sesame Paste麻油 1 ½ tsp Sesame Oil糖 ¾ tsp Sugar生抽 3tsp Soy Sauce陳醋 1½ tsp Mature Vinegar水 30g Water冷麵 240g Cold Noodles青瓜 1/4pc Cucumber蒜頭 2 clove Garlic
以下YouTube視頻示範：



（責任編輯：張信燕） 本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/07/a102701683.html
text:
Desktop cold noodles fun and delicious (video)

07 Nov 2019, 02:13

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 07, 2019] Desktop cold noodles Taiwanese Cold Noodles
Two servings Serve 2 sesame sauce 50g Sesame Paste sesame oil 1 1⁄2 tsp Sesame Oil sugar 3⁄4 tsp Sugar soy sauce 3tsp Soy Sauce vinegar 11⁄2 tsp Mature Vinegar water 30g Water cold noodles 240g Cold Noodles cucumber 1/4pc Cucumber garlic 2 clove Garlic
